name: Workspace Solutions
shortDescription: Executive work spaces at cost-effective prices.
longDescription: ABB Workspaces provides premium, flexible workspace at cost-effective prices. Our services are strategically designed for Business Executives/Traveling Professionals, Entrepreneurs/Startups, and Offshore Entities. We offer unrestricted access to reliable infrastructure (uninterrupted power, high-speed internet) across our Tema and Airport City hubs.

workspaceSolutions.description: Fully furnished, private, and secure dedicated office suites.
workspaceSolutions.useCase: Established companies or executives requiring the highest level of privacy and dedicated infrastructure.

workspaceSolutions.description: Flexible, open-plan shared workspaces available on a membership or day rate basis.
workspaceSolutions.useCase: Freelancers, small teams, or budget-conscious professionals needing a daily professional setting.

workspaceSolutions.description: Bookable spaces tailored for larger structured business activities.
workspaceSolutions.useCase: Conferences, Training Rooms, and larger Team Meeting Spaces.
